account.avatar-placeholder: Please enter your avatar URL here
account.name: Name
account.usage-tip: Below is a summary of the Points usage for your account. The data is updated daily (not in real-time).

auth.access-denied-1: You do not have permission to sign in.
auth.configuration-1: There is a problem with the server configuration.
auth.configuration-2: Check the server logs for more information.
auth.input-valid-email: Please enter a valid email address
auth.sign-in-link: A sign in link has been sent to your email address.
auth.title: Login / Sign up
auth.verification-1: The sign in link is no longer valid.
auth.verification-2: It may have been used already or it may have expired.

character.delete-tip: Are you sure you want to delete this role?

chat.clear-current-conversation: Are you sure to clear the current conversation?
chat.conversation-limit: Free users can only create up to 10 sessions
chat.context-limit-tip: The default length of context carried during this conversation is 8. If you choose 0, there will be no context carried in each session, which is equivalent to a one-question-one-answer format.
chat.delete-chat-tip: Are you sure you want to delete this content?
chat.can-not-empty: The chat content cannot be empty.
chat.title: Title

common.service-error: Service is having a hiccup, please try again later

errorCode.20002: User does not exist, please register first
errorCode.20003: You have already used this license key
errorCode.20005: You have already used your free trial
errorCode.20009: The Model is not available for your current plan. Please upgrade to Premium or Team to unlock this feature
errorCode.20010: Please configure Azure Resource Name first

menu.clear-conversation: Are you sure clear all conversations?
menu.delete-conversation: Are you sure delete this conversation?

premium.bought-success: Activate the License Key in the settings at the lower left corner of the system after purchase.
premium.enter-license-key-to-lock-features: Enter L-GPT License Key to unlock all the features.
premium.premium-3: Unlock all features, Mac and Win Client in the future
premium.premium-4: GPT-4 supported, Claude to be supported in the future.

prompt.get-title: What would be a short and relevant title for this chat? You must strictly answer with only the title, no other text is allowed.
prompt.rule-tip: Do you acknowledge and agree to the above terms in order to continue publishing your prompts?
prompt.rule-title: Agreement for Publishing Prompts on Prompt Market:
prompt.rule-1: After you publish your prompt, it will become pending for review. Once it is approved, it will be synchronized to Prompt Market.
prompt.rule-2: Each user can only submit a maximum of 5 pending prompts. After they are approved, you can continue to submit new prompts.
prompt.rule-3: If your submitted prompt fails to pass the review, the maintenance personnel have the right to delete it directly.
prompt.sure-delete: Are you sure you want to delete
prompt.title: Prompt Title

recharge.pkg-1-desc-2: Get an extra 330,000 points for Premium
recharge.pkg-2-desc-2: Get an extra 700,000 points for Premium

responseErr.10001: Please log in or configure your API Key to use L-GPT.
responseErr.10002: API Key missing, please check configuration or contact the developer
responseErr.10004: Please configure Azure API Version first
responseErr.context_length_exceeded: Session content is too long. Delete some or create a new session.

share.not-exist: Shared content does not exist or has expired, you can click on the button on the upper right corner to return to the homepage and start a new chat.
share.share-created: You have successfully created a sharing link for the current session.
share.share-delete-tip: All unattended sharing links will be automatically cleared after 7 days.
share.share-logged-user-tip: Logged-in users can view and manage their shared links in their personal center after sharing the session link.

setting.api-key-error: Invalid API key. Please make sure your API key is still working properly.
setting.check-api-key-warning: You need to fill in the API Key first to check its validity.
setting.configuration-learn-more: Any questions? Click to learn more.
setting.max-tokens-tip: Set token limits for each model response. These tokens are shared between prompts (including system messages, examples, message history, and user queries) and model responses. One token is roughly equivalent to 4 characters of typical English text.
setting.name: Name
setting.reset-data-tip: Are you sure you want to reset all data? (Including chat and settings data)
setting.sure-delete-deployment: Are you sure you want to delete this deployment?
setting.temperature-tip: Higher values will make the output more random, while lower values will make the output more focused and more deterministic.
setting.title: L-GPT Setting

token.how-token-work-1: It is calculated according to the rules of each language model based on the total length of the current session content.
token.how-token-work-2: When the conversation reaches a certain length, you will no longer be able to add any more messages to the conversation. This is a contextual limit on the conversation content of each language model.
token.how-token-work-3: For example, GPT-3.5 allows a maximum of 4,096 tokens per session. GPT-4 allows a maximum of 8,192 tokens per session in its 8K model, and a maximum of 32,768 tokens in its 32K model. The context length limit may increase for various language models in the future.
token.how-token-work-4: If the current conversation reaches the context limit, you can delete some of the conversation content or start a new conversation to continue chatting.
token.how-to-cost-1: Any content related to a chat conversation will incur conversation costs.
token.how-to-cost-2-1: All costs are "estimated values" calculated by
token.how-to-cost-3: Each language model has its own pricing, and the corresponding official website has a detailed description of the pricing.
token.know-more: Click here to learn more about OpenAI models, tokens, and context limits.
token.token-desc: Tokens are the basic unit that LLM models use to compute the length of a text. They are groups of characters, which sometimes align with words, but not always. In particular, it depends on the number of characters and includes punctuation signs or emojis.

tts.auth-error: Text-to-Speech is not available for your current plan. Please upgrade to Premium or Team to unlock this feature.
tts.auto-play-tip: Play the audio automatically after each reply
tts.voice-tip: Choosing en voice may not play Chinese properly.

welcome.desc: L-GPT is an open-source project that helps you improve your learning, work, and life efficiency by providing various AI models.
